pr_title: Extracts essential CSS off the responsive-grid.css file

timeline.message: Extracts essential CSS off the responsive-grid.css file

timeline.bodyText: In Chrome since 2011, in FireFox since 2014 without prefix. Maybe not needed?

timeline.bodyText: This has changed from border-box to inherit, is that fine?

replies.bodyText: Yes, it will take the value from the html tag
